Package jaca.android.dev

Interface Summary
IJaCaActivity  
 

Class Summary
ActivityEventsFetcher Class used for managing the dispatch of Activity events to CArtAgO Artifacts
BaseEventFetcher Base class used for managing the dispatch of Android events to CArtAgO Artifacts
BroadcastReceiverArtifact Base artifact for receive intents sent by sendBroadcast().
EventOpInfo Class representing a generic Android Event (GUI events, Sensors events, etc).
GUIArtifact Developers must extend this class to define an artifact usable from agents for observe and control Android view interface.
JaCaActivity Developers must extend this class to define a standard Android Activity linked to a specialisation of a CArtAgO GUIArtifact
JaCaArtifact Base class to extend in order to realise a JaCa-Android artifact.
JaCaListActivity Developers must extend this class to define a standard Android ListActivity linked to a specialisation of a CArtAgO GUIArtifact
JaCaPreferenceActivity Developers must extend this class to define a standard Android PreferenceActivity linked to a specialisation of a CArtAgO GUIArtifact
JaCaTabActivity Developers must extend this class to define a standard Android TabActivity linked to a specialisation of a CArtAgO GUIArtifact
ListActivityArtifact Developers must extend this class to define an artifact usable from agents for observe and control Android ListActivity GUI #### Observable Property #####
state(State)State = {"running","paused","stopped"}
LocationManagerArtifact This class provides access to the system location services.
PreferenceChangeEventsFetcher Class used for managing the dispatch of PreferenceChange events to CArtAgO Artifacts
PreferenceGUIArtifact Developers must extend this class to define an artifact usable from agents for observe and control Android view interface that also allows the user to interact with application preferences.
SensorEventsFetcher Class used for managing the dispatch of Sensor events to CArtAgO Artifacts
SensorManagerArtifact Base artifact used for managing the device sensors.
TelephonyManagerArtifact Provides access to information about the telephony services on the device.
